tn.ref: It came about at the end of twenty years

tn.text: Solomon represents his whole fighting army. AT: "Solomon's army attacked the town of Hamathzolbah" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])

tn.ref: who were left after them in the land

tn.text: See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:2ch:05:09|5:9]]
This is a covered porch or walkway supported by columns, attached to a building.
AT: "according to the daily requirements of the law of Moses"

tn.ref: people did not deviate from the commands
